official_title: J.P. Valles Professor, Stern School of Business; Distinguished Professor, Tandon School of Engineering, NYU; Director of the NYU Shanghai Program on Creativity + Innovation, Affiliated Professor, Global Network Professor, NYU Shanghai
bio:
Adam Brandenburger holds appointments at New York University as J.P. Valles Professor at the Stern School of Business, Distinguished Professor at the Tandon School of Engineering, and Director of the NYU Shanghai Program on Creativity + Innovation.  He was a professor at Harvard Business School from 1987 to 2002.  He received his B.A., M.Phil., and Ph.D. degrees from the University of Cambridge.  Adam researches in the areas of game theory, information theory, and cognitive science.

For more information, please visit Professor Brandenburger's personal website.
